ns about newborn care 
 ∙ If pregnant woman is HIV positive, tie up with nearest Integrated Counselling and Testing Centre (ICTC) for 
prevention of parent to child transmission
2. Public Health Functions
 ∙ Ensure that ANM/ASHA maintain the line list of HRP women, and they must be individually tracked for 
getting their routine medicines, periodic consultation, and timely referrals.
3. Managerial Functions
 ∙ Ensure that ASHAs and MPWs are able to identify all pregnant women within the HWC serv
